# The `SDNodeFlags` Struct Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

These are IR-level optimization flags that may be propagated to SDNodes. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>struct llvm::SDNodeFlags</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

These are IR-level optimization flags that may be propagated to SDNodes.

TODO: This data structure should be shared by the IR optimizer and the the backend.

Definition at line 381 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/selectiondagnodes-h">SelectionDAGNodes.h</a>.
